text: Certain polearms, such as the Ji, can parry incoming attacks.
Flammable rosin sticks to clothing and armour.
Specially made crossbow bolts from Chen.
The roar of gunpowder is more terrifying than any man or beast.
Powerful toxins spread and paralyze the body.
Shots from the White Horse Fellows give their enemies pause.
This unit has been overwhelmed by the enemy and cannot move properly.
Whether through hooking, or hacking, axes have a unique ability to reduce the effectiveness of shields.
